name: Paul Tavares
body:
### My Projects
My Current projects on github are:

* SPWidgets - SharePoint client side widgets for use in custom UI's - [purtuga.github.com/SPWidgets](http://purtuga.github.com/SPWidgets/)

More will be added soon, as I look to move several of my (up until now) private projects to the Web.

### About Me

* Blog: [paultavares.wordpress.com](http://paultavares.wordpress.com)
* Twitter: [@paul_tavares](https://twitter.com/paul_tavares)
* Personal Site: [purtuga.com](http://www.purtuga.com)
